description:
The lightweight Nano 24 is ready to take on any adventure, from a hike on the local trails to a exploring the street markets of Europe. A low-profile packable design makes it easy to stuff inside your checked luggage, then deploy at your destination.

  • Made of lightweight yet abrasion-resistant 210-denier nylon ripstop with an extra-durable 420-denier high-density nylon base panel
  • Airmesh harness and breathable die-cut backpanel comfortably carry the load without excess weight and bulk
  • Webbing waistbelt stabilizes the load or can be removed if you don't need it
  • Front stretch mesh pocket with buckle closure for stashing extra gear
  • Zippered front pocket has an internal organizer and a key clip
  • Side mesh pockets carry water bottles
  • Front loop lets you clip on a blinky light
  • Internal hydration sleeve fits a 3L reservoir. (Reservoir sold separately)
name: Gregory Nano 24 Daypack - Unisex
